snippet.title: Gargoyle's Quest II (NES) All Bosses (No Damage)
snippet.description: Gargoyle's Quest II: The Demon Darkness (NES) All Bosses (No Damage). It is 1992 an action-adventure game released on the NES by Capcom. It is the prequel to Gargoyle's Quest (part of the Ghosts 'n Goblins franchise) and features a similar gameplay style, which combines adventure elements with side-scrolling action in a macabre fantasy setting.
